latestAction.text: On agreeing to the McIntyre amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the McIntyre amendment (A014). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
